items.headline: ‘She did a lot of things behind my back’: My father excluded me from his will. My ‘sneaky’ sister, his executor, is to blame.

items.headline: The surprising stocks leading the tech sector this year thanks to an AI renaissance
items.summary_en: Western Digital and Seagate were once sleepy cyclical stocks. But storage technology is now at the heart of the AI boom, and analysts see no signs of a slowdown ahead.

items.headline: I received an inheritance from my father’s estate, but the executor wants me to give it back. What should I do?
